name: SleepSoundsWhite
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep sounds white
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Sounds White lets you reproduce incredible audio tracks that will make you feel fantastic. This skill will make you feel better and fall asleep faster.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill. 
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines. 
Click + to add a new routine. 
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one. 
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills". 
Choose "Your Skills". 
Select this skill. 
Click Next. 
Choose Device to perform the routine to. 
Click Save. 

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! 
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
